meanings.definition: Consisting of multiple phases or stages.
meanings.sent1: The project required a multiphasic approach to ensure all stages were completed successfully.
meanings.sent2: The scientist conducted a multiphasic study to analyze the different phases of the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The multiphasic nature of the puzzle made it challenging yet fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her multiphasic personality revealed different sides of her character in various situations.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a multiphasic technique to create a painting with layers of depth and complexity.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to multiple phases or stages.
meanings.sent1: The multiphasic project required careful planning to coordinate all the different stages.
meanings.sent2: The team used a multiphasic approach to tackle the complex project efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The multiphasic schedule seemed overwhelming at first, but it helped in organizing tasks effectively.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a multiphasic journey, moving through various stages of contemplation.
meanings.sent5: The multiphasic nature of the story kept the audience engaged as it unfolded in different phases.
